title: Fullstack Developer till Aranya – Bygg framtidens nätverksplattform!
description:
### **Är du en nyfiken och lösningsorienterad utvecklare som vill kombinera frontend- och backendutveckling med djup teknisk förståelse? Då vill vi gärna höra från dig!**


Vi på **Aranya** söker en **Fullstack Developer** som vill vara med och vidareutveckla vår egenutvecklade plattform – **ACP (Aranya Connectivity Platform)**. Vi är ett växande techbolag med hög trivsel, teknikhöjd och stora ambitioner och nu vill vi förstärka vårt DevOps-team med en nyckelperson som vill bygga stabil, modern och användarvänlig teknik.

#### **Om rollen**


Som Fullstack Developer kommer du att jobba brett med både frontend, backend, databashantering och API-integrationer. Du blir en viktig del i att driva vår plattform framåt – tekniskt, upplevelsemässigt och arkitektoniskt.

 **Du kommer bland annat att:**

* Utveckla och förbättra vårt användargränssnitt med React och TypeScript
* Implementera backendlogik och integrationer i exempelvis Node.js eller Python
* Designa och optimera databaser (t.ex. PostgreSQL)
* Bygga och dokumentera API:er – både interna och externa
* Arbeta med DevOps kring CI/CD, testautomatisering och driftsättning
* Automatisera arbetsflöden med egna verktyg och skript
* Arbeta med säkerhet, övervakning, loggning och prestanda i hela stacken

#### **Vem söker vi?**


Du har ett par års erfarenhet och trivs i miljöer där du får kombinera teknik med kreativ problemlösning. Du gillar att ta ansvar, bidra till teamet och har en vilja att förstå helheten i de lösningar du bygger.

**Vi tror att du har:**

* 3–5 års erfarenhet som fullstackutvecklare eller liknande
* Starka kunskaper i React med TypeScript
* Erfarenhet av backendutveckling (Node.js, Python eller liknande)
* Erfarenhet av API-design och databashantering
* Förståelse för säkerhet, prestanda och skalbarhet i en produktionsmiljö

**Meriterande:**

* Tidigare erfarenhet från SaaS- eller techbolag
* Erfarenhet av CI/CD, Docker/Kubernetes eller molnplattformar
* Kunskap om DevOps, IaC, eller verktyg som Postman, Swagger, GitHub Actions

#### **Personliga egenskaper**


Vi söker dig som är:

* **Kreativ** – du hittar nya vägar, föreslår lösningar och förbättrar det som finns
* **Analytisk** – du förstår tekniska samband och tar smarta beslut
* **Trygg** – du är stabil och tar ansvar även i pressade situationer

#### **Varför Aranya?**


På Aranya får du:

* En plats i ett nyfiket, prestigelöst och kunnigt techteam
* Möjlighet att påverka en egenutvecklad plattform i tillväxtfas
* En kultur som präglas av öppenhet, samarbete och ständigt lärande
* Möjlighet att utvecklas vidare mot arkitektur, teknikval eller produktstrategi
* Stort förtroende, vi tror på att du vet bäst hur du gör ditt jobb


Ledarskapet är närvarande, stödjande och tydligt. Vi jobbar tätt ihop över roller, funktioner och teams och har kul längs vägen. Vill du prata med någon som redan jobbar här? Säg till, vi förmedlar gärna kontakt.

title: Backend-utvecklare med fokus på Python & E-handel
description:
#### **Var med och bygg framtidens hållbara e-handelslösningar**


Är du en skicklig utvecklare med passion för kod och backend-utveckling? Hos oss på Drakryggen får du möjlighet att utveckla skalbara och robusta system som hanterar stora datamängder och hög trafik. Vi söker dig som gillar tekniska utmaningar och trivs i agila team där samarbete, ansvar och kvalitet är nyckeln till framgång.Du behöver ha rättighet att bo och arbeta i Sverige.

##### **Dina ansvarsområden**

* **Design och arkitektur:** Designa, utveckla och optimera backend-lösningar med fokus på prestanda och skalbarhet.
* **Värdeskapande:** Översätta kundkrav till lösningar som gör skillnad på riktigt tillsammans med teamet.
* **Helhetsansvar:** Bidra till hela utvecklingsprocessen – från de första kravställningarna till produktionssättning.

##### **Din kompetens**

* Minst 3–4 års erfarenhet av utveckling i Python och gärna Django.
* Systemintegration**, s**kapa och förbättra API:er och integrationsflöden mot externa tjänster och molnplattformar.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med system som hanterar stora datamängder och hög trafik.
* Kunskap om molnplattformar som Azure, AWS eller Google Cloud Platform (GCP).
* Erfarenhet av arbete i agila utvecklingsteam.
* Flytande svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.

##### **Meriterande kompetens (bör-krav)**

* **Branscherfarenhet:** Erfarenhet av e-handelsplattformar, retail-system eller arbete med integrationer och betallösningar.
* **Utbildning och arkitektur:** Högskoleutbildning inom systemutveckling (eller motsvarande erfarenhet) samt kunskaper inom design av skalbara och robusta system.
* **Teknisk bredd:** Erfarenhet av andra stackar som C# / .NET, Java, Kotlin eller Node.js.
* **Frontend & Mobil:** Utveckling i moderna ramverk som React, Next.js, React Native eller Flutter.
* **Microsoft-ekosystemet:** Erfarenhet av arbete i Microsoft SharePoint

##### **Vad kommer du göra?**


Som en viktig del av teamet kommer du att arbeta med att utveckla och förbättra framgångsrika e-handelsplattformar. Du löser tekniska utmaningar kreativt och förbättrar system för att möta framtidens konsumentbehov. Du kommer att ha ett nära samarbete med övriga utvecklare och få stor insyn i hur vi bygger affärsvärde genom teknik.

#### **Våra värderingar**


Riktig hållbarhet börjar med människorna.


Vi vill att du ska må bra, utvecklas och känna stolthet över det du bidrar med.


Vi tror på:

* **Öppenhet & ärlighet** – genuina samtal där vi kan prata på riktigt, oavsett roll.
* **Att vara ditt bästa jag** – att bidra med engagemang och ansvar, utifrån där du är.
* **Proaktivitet & passion** – att se framåt, ta initiativ och göra skillnad.

#### **Vår rekryteringsprocess**


Vår rekryteringsprocess handlar om att vi ska lära känna varandra och få en känsla för om vi är en bra match. Vi gillar meningsfulla samtal och ärlighet och ser fram emot att lära känna vem du är och att du ska få en chans att visa vad du kan, vi går igenom följande steg:

* Kortare telefonsamtal med rekryterande chef för att stämma av om rollen och våra värderingar stämmer överens med dina egna mål och vad du vill framåt.
* Djupintervju med teknisk chef som berättar mer om rollen och du får chans att berätta mer om dina erfarenheter. Vi pratar också igenom hur du samarbetar och hur vi jobbar enligt våra värderingar.
* Programmeringstillfälle med en utvecklare från Drakryggen. Vi löser ett kodproblem tillsammans där du tänker högt och driver lösningen framåt.

#### **Vilka är Drakryggen?**


Vi på Drakryggen vill göra saker som är roliga eller viktiga. Och utvecklande. Ibland är det vi gör både roligt och viktigt samtidigt som det är utvecklande. Då har vi lyckats. Som företag har vi ett starkt engagemang för FN:s globala hållbarhetsmål. Vår ambition är att skapa lösningar som inte bara är effektiva och innovativa, utan som också kan bidra till långsiktiga hållbarhetsmål och stödja en mer cirkulär ekonomi.

##### **Vad kan vi erbjuda?**


Vi tror på en hälsosam arbetslivsbalans och en prestigelös miljö som bidrar till teamets utveckling. Du får inom rimliga ramar fri arbetsplats och flexibel arbetstid. Vi ger dig möjligheter att utveckla nya färdigheter i en inkluderande arbetsmiljö tillsammans med proffsiga och ödmjuka kollegor.

##### **Vad du får hos oss:**

* 6 veckors semester
* Vi erbjuder friskvårdsbidrag på 5 000 kronor per år
* Sjukvårdförsäkring
* Ständig utveckling genom våra lärandesessioner
* Hybrid arbetsplats med bas i Linköping
* Tjänstepension (5,5–30 % avsättning via SPP)
* Stort inflytande – du är en medskapare av vår framtid


Du kan läsa mer om oss och hur det är att jobba på Drakryggen på vår hemsida och på LinkedIn.


Vi vet att mångfald skapar bättre lösningar och välkomnar ansökningar från alla bakgrunder och erfarenheter.

*Ta chansen och bli en del av oss på Drakryggen - vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!*

title: Erfaren systemutvecklare till Drakryggen Göteborg
description:
**För dig med teknisk tyngd och viljan att bygga kvalitet på riktigt**


Vi söker nu en systemutvecklare till vårt Göteborgskontor för att stärka vårt inhouse-team. Hos oss på Drakryggen får du det bästa av två världar: tryggheten i att arbeta tätt tillsammans med dina kollegor i våra egna projekt, kombinerat med möjligheten att på sikt anta spännande utmaningar hos våra strategiska kunder. Vi tror på att bygga teknisk kvalitet och kulturell förankring inhouse innan vi tar nästa steg tillsammans.


Vi söker dig som inte bara skriver kod, utan som brinner för hantverket och förstår vikten av att bygga skalbara, robusta system. Vi letar efter den där unika kombinationen av teknisk skärpa och ett lösningsorienterat driv – oavsett om du har samlat på dig erfarenhet under många år eller om du är i början av din karriär och har 3-4 års erfarenhet som utvecklare och redan vet att du levererar på en hög nivå. Du behöver ha rättighet att bo och arbeta i Sverige.

##### **Exempel på arbetsuppgifter**

* **Utveckling:** Designa, implementera och underhålla funktionalitet i våra system (frontend och backend) med fokus på hög leveranskvalitet. Det handlar ofta om webb-utveckling men ibland om helt andra tekniska kontexter som t.ex. integration av sensorer riktade mot besöksupplevelser.
* **Kvalitet:** Skriva tester, genomföra kodgranskningar och bidra till en kodbas vi är stolta över
* **Drift och säkerhet:** Delta i drift- och säkerhetsarbete i Azure eller andra moderna molnplattformar.
* **Samarbete:** Jobba agilt med produktägare, UX-designers och kollegor för att leverera verkligt värde.
* **Mentorskap:** Dela kunskap och handleda juniora medarbetare – vi växer genom att hjälpa varandra.

##### **Vi söker dig som**

* Har relevant erfarenhet av systemutveckling och gärna inom flera teknologistackar som React eller Angular inom webbfrontend och C#, Node.js, python, java eller liknande moderna språk.
* Har erfarenhet av att bygga och konsumera REST/GraphQL-API:er.
* Har erfarenhet av arbete i molnplattformar, exempelvis Azure, AWS eller Google Cloud Platform (GCP).
* Arbetar strukturerat, skriver tydlig och testbar kod samt är van vid versionshantering (Git).
* Trivs med tvärfunktionellt samarbete och har en god kommunikationsförmåga.
* **Delar våra värderingar:** Prestigelöshet, långsiktighet och fokus på hållbarhet.

##### **Meriterande**

* Erfarenhet av CI/CD-pipelines och containerisering (Docker, Kubernetes).
* Kännedom om headless CMS som Storyblok eller liknande.
* Kännedom om Sharepoint-utveckling.
* Intresse för SEO och hur tekniska lösningar påverkar synlighet och användarupplevelse.
* Erfarenhet av automatiserade tester och testdriven utveckling.

##### **Vad vi erbjuder**

* **En mångfald av olika teknikstackar:** En möjlighet att arbeta med verkliga, meningsfulla projekt där din kod gör skillnad.
* **Stöd och kultur:** Handledning från erfarna utvecklare i en inkluderande miljö där människan står i centrum.
* **Hållbarhet:** En arbetsplats som agerar för framtiden och prioriterar långsiktiga lösningar.
* **Flexibilitet:** En hälsosam balans med hybridarbete och 1–2 dagar per vecka på vårt kontor i Göteborg.
* **Inflytande:** Stor påverkan över tekniska val och goda möjligheter att växa i din roll.

#### **Våra värderingar**


Riktig hållbarhet börjar med människorna.


Vi vill att du ska må bra, utvecklas och känna stolthet över det du bidrar med.


Vi tror på:

* **Öppenhet & ärlighet** – genuina samtal där vi kan prata på riktigt, oavsett roll.
* **Att vara ditt bästa jag** – att bidra med engagemang och ansvar, utifrån där du är.
* **Proaktivitet & passion** – att se framåt, ta initiativ och göra skillnad.

#### **Vår rekryteringsprocess**


Vår rekryteringsprocess handlar om att vi ska lära känna varandra och få en känsla för om vi är en bra match. Vi gillar meningsfulla samtal och ärlighet och ser fram emot att lära känna vem du är och att du ska få en chans att visa vad du kan, vi går igenom följande steg:

* Kortare telefonsamtal med rekryterande chef för att stämma av om rollen och våra värderingar stämmer överens med dina egna mål och vad du vill framåt.
* Djupintervju med teknisk chef som berättar mer om rollen och du får chans att berätta mer om dina erfarenheter. Vi pratar också igenom hur du samarbetar och hur vi jobbar enligt våra värderingar.
* Programmeringstillfälle med en utvecklare från Drakryggen. Vi löser ett kodproblem tillsammans där du tänker högt och driver lösningen framåt.

#### **Vilka är Drakryggen?**


Vi på Drakryggen vill göra saker som är roliga eller viktiga. Och utvecklande. Ibland är det vi gör både roligt och viktigt samtidigt som det är utvecklande. Då har vi lyckats. Som företag har vi ett starkt engagemang för FN:s globala hållbarhetsmål. Vår ambition är att skapa lösningar som inte bara är effektiva och innovativa, utan som också kan bidra till långsiktiga hållbarhetsmål och stödja en mer cirkulär ekonomi.

##### **Vad kan vi erbjuda?**


Vi tror på en hälsosam arbetslivsbalans och en prestigelös miljö som bidrar till teamets utveckling. Du får inom rimliga ramar fri arbetsplats och flexibel arbetstid. Vi ger dig möjligheter att utveckla nya färdigheter i en inkluderande arbetsmiljö tillsammans med proffsiga och ödmjuka kollegor.

##### **Vad du får hos oss:**

* 6 veckors semester
* Vi erbjuder friskvårdsbidrag på 5 000 kronor per år
* Sjukvårdförsäkring
* Ständig utveckling genom våra lärandesessioner
* Hybrid arbetsplats med bas i Linköping
* Tjänstepension (5,5–30 % avsättning via SPP)
* Stort inflytande – du är en medskapare av vår framtid


Du kan läsa mer om oss och hur det är att jobba på Drakryggen på vår hemsida och på LinkedIn.


Vi vet att mångfald skapar bättre lösningar och välkomnar ansökningar från alla bakgrunder och erfarenheter.

*Ta chansen och bli en del av oss på Drakryggen - vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!*

title: Systemutvecklare PEGA
description:
Vi i söker en erfaren systemutvecklare med specialistkompetens inom Pega för ett heltidsuppdrag. Du blir en del av ett agilt team där fokus ligger på utveckling och leverans av lösningar utifrån teamets backlog. Arbetet sker i nära samarbete med andra utvecklare, kravanalytiker och testare.

#### **Arbetsuppgifter**

* Utveckling och vidareutveckling av lösningar i Pega-plattformen enligt teamets prioriteringar
* Aktivt deltagande i planering, utveckling och leverans
* Säkerställa teknisk funktionalitet och integrationer mot kringliggande system
* Bidra till kontinuerlig förbättring av teamets arbetssätt och processer

#### **Önskad kompetens**

* Flerårig erfarenhet som Pega-utvecklare
* Gedigen erfarenhet av API:er, integrationer och databaser
* Vana av moderna utvecklingsverktyg och miljöer såsom GitLab, Azure DevOps och containerteknik
* Erfarenhet av testmetodik och kvalitetssäkring

#### **Övrig information**

* **Omfattning:** 100 %
* **Språk:** Svenska
* **Start:** Omgående
* **Uppdragsperiod:** 2026-02-20 – 2027-02-28
* **Placering:** Stockholm

#### **Ansökan**


Vänligen skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt och bifoga:

* Uppdaterat CV
* Timpris (inklusive omkostnader)
* Tillgänglighetsdatum
* En kort motivering till varför du är lämplig för uppdraget
company_description: For everyone, everywhere. We're people building money without borders.

title: Frontend Developer with focus on UX/UI
description:
At Evolution AB / Nolimit City, we're building cutting-edge gaming products that redefine how players experience online entertainment. As we continue to grow, we're looking for a Frontend Developer with a strong UX/UI focus, or a UX/UI Designer with frontend development chops, to join one of our expanding engineering teams.
 



  





 You'll play a key role in shaping the look, feel, and interactivity of products that reach a global audience—contributing not only to how things work but also how they feel. At Evolution, design and development are not siloed; you'll be an essential part of product decisions from day one, working in highly collaborative, autonomous teams.
 



  





**What You'll Do** 



* Design and build intuitive, responsive, and beautiful interfaces with React (Next.js) and TypeScript.
* Bring UX and UI designs to life—from wireframes to pixel-perfect implementation.
* Collaborate closely with product owners and engineers to craft seamless user experiences.
* Own the frontend from concept to production, including performance optimization, accessibility, and maintainability.
* Contribute to our design system and help shape a consistent visual language across products.
* Continuously experiment, iterate, and improve based on real user feedback and data.
* Be part of a team that values learning through iteration, experimentation, and shared responsibility.



  





**You Might Be a Great Fit If You** 



* Have solid experience with React, TypeScript, and modern CSS techniques.
* Possess a keen eye for design details, and care deeply about creating delightful user experiences.
* Enjoy bridging the gap between design and development.
* Are comfortable building advanced components.
* Believe in clean, maintainable code and smooth user flows.
* Have good communication skills in English and love working in a collaborative environment.



  





**Bonus Points** 



* Experience with Next.js, Redux Toolkit, or Headless CMSs like Strapi.
* Understanding of accessibility and web performance best practices.
* Familiarity with UI/UX testing tools or user research methods.
* An interest in gaming or digital entertainment interfaces.



  





**Technologies You'll Touch** 



* React / Next.js
* TypeScript / JavaScript
* Redux Toolkit
* CSS / Tailwind CSS
* Strapi (Headless CMS)
* Git (GitHub Actions)



  





**Who we are** 




 We care more about your potential than checking every box. If you're excited about building exceptional interfaces and love working in small, empowered teams, we want to hear from you.
 



  





 Join one of Sweden's fastest-growing tech companies and help us craft experiences that players around the world love.
 



  





 Nolimit City, Stockholm based development team. We provide you with your choice of OS and IDE.
 



  





 Apply on LinkedIn, or send your application to hr-sweden@nolimitcity.com
 



  





 http://www.nolimitcity.com

title: Software Developer
description:
**Role:**
 Develop, configure, and maintain document templates and flows in Quadient Inspire, ensuring high-quality output across both print and digital channels.
   

  

 Optimize template performance, document generation, and runtime behavior.
   

  

 Collaborate with product specialists, projects, and IT developers to secure smooth transition and robust solution delivery.
   

  

 Contribute to continuous improvement of our output management processes and architecture.
   

  

 Support the migration from ISIS Papyrus to Inspire, including rebuilding templates, testing, and validating output.
   

  

**Essential requirements:**
 Strong hands-on expertise with Quadient Inspire (CCM)
   

  

* Proven experience using Inspire Designer, Content Manager, Automation, and Interactive to build and maintain document solutions.


 Advanced template development and logic
   

  

* Ability to design complex templates with dynamic content, conditional logic, reusable components, and master templates.


 Data integration and document output knowledge
   

  

* Solid skills in data model design, binding structured data to templates, and working with key output formats (especially PDF and AFP).


 Performance optimization and troubleshooting
   

  

* Experience debugging templates, optimizing document generation/runtime behavior, and ensuring high-quality output across print and digital channels.


 Migration and collaboration capability
   

  

* Experience supporting or executing migrations (specifically ISIS Papyrus → Inspire), working closely with product specialists, IT developers, and Agile teams.


**Meritorious:**
 Scripting and data definition skills
   

  

* JavaScript or PQL, plus experience with XML/XSD for structured data validation.


 Enterprise integration exposure
   

  

* Familiarity with REST, SOAP, CMIS, or similar integration technologies.


 Prior ISIS Papyrus experience
   

  

* Direct experience with Papyrus templates and architecture to accelerate migration and reduce risk.

title: Full Stack Engineer
description:
Join one of Europe's most exciting and impactful start-ups!
 



  





 I'm currently working with one of Europe's most promising start-ups, whose product is a world-first, combining a user-focused, AI-powered insurance platform, with a premium companion app centred around preventative healthcare!
 



  





 Having successfully launched in multiple European markets, accruing over 150,000 customers and seeing over 300% growth in revenue in recent years, they are in a fantastic position to continue to scale organically, and grow their incredibly talented tech department!
 



  





 We are looking for an experienced full-stack web developer to build and develop both critical internal web interfaces, and the AI-powered tools which allow them to fully automate the insurance claims process!
 



  





 ⚡Your main responsibilities:
 



  




* Develop and maintain robust and scalable web applications
* Designing backend APIs in
 **TypeScript / Node.js** 
 , exposed via

* Building modern and efficient interfaces in

 services for integrating LLM APIs

title: Senior Software Developer (Network Infrastructure)
description:
**Job Description**

**WHAT YOU’LL DO**




 We’re looking for a
 **Senior Software Developer** 
 with
 **Network automation experience,** 
 to join our Networking team and help automate and optimize
 
 global network infrastructure. In this role, you’ll build tools and platforms that enhance visibility, resilience, and deployment speed across retail, warehouse, and data center environments. You’ll work closely with network engineers and architects to design scalable systems for multi-vendor networks (
 **Cisco, Aruba) and cloud connectivity (Azure).** 
  

  





 In addition to the above, your role will involve:
   

  




* Design, develop, and implement network automation solutions using
 **Python and Ansible.**
* Manage and maintain
 **Linux-based systems** 
 .
* Apply DevOps principles to streamline workflows, including
 **CI/CD processes** 
 .
* Oversee software development processes, including
 **testing, code analysis** 
 , and release management.
* Lead network automation initiatives with a focus on routing, switching, and working with Cisco and Aruba technologies.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to drive projects to completion.
* Independently manage development tasks and initiatives, even in the absence of clear direction.



**WHO YOU’LL WORK WITH** 
  

  





 You’ll be working closely with our
 **Networking team** 
 to design and evolve our global network infrastructure across data centers, warehouses, and retail environments. This is a collaborative environment where the team operates cutting-edge technology that’s always on, while also fostering a culture of fun and teamwork.
   

  





**WHO YOU ARE**




 We are looking for people to have experience with...
   

  




* Proficiency in
 **Python** 
 and at least one other programming language.
* Experience with
 **network automation frameworks.**
* Understanding of networking fundamentals (TCP/IP, DNS, routing, switching).
* Familiarity with CI/CD workflows and tools.
* Experience with REST APIs, event-driven systems, and webhook-based integrations.
* Knowledge of data modeling and API integration with systems.
* Knowledge of AI/ML development is a plus.



 Nice to have:
   

  




* Master’s in Computer Science, Network Engineering, Data Science, or related field.
* Experience automating Cisco, Aruba, or cloud networking.
* Knowledge of hybrid cloud environments.
* Advanced Python skills.
* Hands-on with Ansible and Linux systems.
* Proven DevOps experience (CI/CD workflows).
* Strong grasp of software development best practices.
* 4–5 years in network automation.
* Expertise in routing, switching, and Cisco/Aruba technologies.
* Ability to work independently and in teams.



 And people who are…
   

  




* Strong analytical and problem-solving mindset.
* Able to work independently and collaboratively in a global team.
* Passionate about innovation, automation, and continuous improvement.
* Excellent in communication and documentation skills.



**WHO WE ARE** 
  

  





 H&M Group is a global company of strong fashion brands and ventures. Our goal is to prove that there is no compromise between exceptional design, affordable prices, and sustainable solutions. We want to liberate fashion for the many, and our customers are at the heart of every decision we make.
   

  





 We are made up of thousands of passionate and talented colleagues united by our shared culture and values. Together, we want to use our power, our scale, and our knowledge to push the fashion industry towards a more inclusive and sustainable future.
   

  





**WHY YOU’LL LOVE WORKING HERE** 
  

  





 At H&M Group, we are proud to be a vibrant and welcoming company. We offer our employees attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe.
   

  




* **Staff discount card:** 
 Usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online.
* **H&M Incentive Program (HIP** 
 ): Included in our HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here.
* **Competitive pensions** 
 : Collective Agreement and ITP pensions competitive to the Swedish market.
* **Generous vacation** 
 : 30 days' vacation, health care allowance, and good work-life balance.
* **Additional perks** 
 : Discounts from Benify.
* **Innovative Environment:** 
 Work with cutting-edge technology and innovative solutions.
* **Global Impact** 
 : Be part of a team that influences users worldwide.
* **Professional Growth** 
 : Endless opportunities to learn and develop your skills.
* **Collaborative Culture** 
 : Join a motivated team that values collaboration and excellence.



**JOIN US** 
  

  





 Our uniqueness comes from a combination of many things – our inclusive and collaborative culture, our strong values, and opportunities for growth. But most of all, it’s our people who make us who we are.
   

  





 Take the next step in your career together with us. The journey starts here.

title: Senior .NET developer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* Strong professional experience with backend systems in C# and .NET Core.
* Solid understanding of cloud-native architecture and CI/CD pipelines.
* Excellent communication skills and a collaborative mindset.
* Experience of migrating components to Kubernetes
* Experience with Kubernetes and AWS in production (or other cloud environments)
* worked with distributed systems and transaction


**Meritorious**
* Service-oriented architectures.
* Familiarity with databases such as MySQL, MSSQL, or Redis.
* Additional programming languages (e.g., C++, Python, Kotlin).


**Application deadline:** 
 21-01-2026
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Software Engineer
description:
**If you want to work with automation at scale, build tools that internal teams rely on daily, and solve real, impactful engineering problems across hardware and software, this is the right place!** 




  





**ABOUT US** 




 Toptracer Technologies have users and viewers all over the world. Our mission is to help people enjoy the wonderful game of golf even more by tracing contributions to TV and gamification to ranges. Our range technology is used in 33 countries and the broadcast is aired over 270 times yearly. All of our products are developed, tested and deployed from our R&D office in Danderyd, Stockholm.
 



  





**THE TEAM** 




 Our mission is to systematically automate and orchestrate range systems at scale, enabling internal teams to operate thousands of servers with high reliability and minimal manual intervention.
 



  





 We build and maintain the tooling that makes this possible — from provisioning software to monitoring large, distributed environments — ensuring that our ranges run efficiently, predictably, and with strong observability.
 



  





 Take the chance to leave your mark on the software architecture of an innovative tech company in a unique part of the tech field, in a team with diverse expertise who are passionate about building smart software.
 



  





**THE ROLE** 




 The team is now looking for a Software Engineer. With a broad background in software development, you will be driving technical decisions within the team and taking an active part in the company’s overall architectural and strategic discussions around ensuring scalability and enabling growth. Day-to-day you will be writing code with the team.
 



  





**HOW WE WORK** 




 Weekly pair/mob programming sessions for alignment and shared decision-making.
 



 Regular demos to stakeholders to gather feedback early.
 



 Pull requests shared in team chat for quick review loops.
 



 Technical decisions discussed and agreed upon in mob sessions.
 



 A dedicated third-line support rotation for daily operational support.
 



  





**TECH STACK FOCUS** 




 Kubernetes platform with thousands of clusters
 



 Python for backend and general application development
 



 Developing for Linux environments
 



  





**POSSIBILITIES** 



* Develop and maintain tools that orchestrate and manage thousands of range systems.
* Ensure servers can be provisioned, configured, and managed effortlessly, supported by robust internal tooling.
* Build and evolve monitoring and observability tools that give real-time insight into software running across all ranges.
* Provide release management and regression test environments relied on by many internal teams.
* Work closely with hardware-adjacent software (servers, screens, cameras) and Linux-based environments
* And of course, playing golf!



  





**WE BELIEVE YOU HAVE** 



* Experience in backend programming with Python
* Experience in building Kubernetes platforms
* Several years of developing for Linux environments
* Several years of experience and a highly collaborative mindset.
* Great knowledge sharing and have strong abilities in coaching the other team members in order for the team to best solve technical challenges that are presented to them, together.
* Experience in deploying and maintaining cloud-based and distributed systems
* Understanding of large systems and how different components integrate



  





**What Makes This Role Unique** 




 Most companies manage a handful of servers — we manage thousands. The challenge and reward lie in building systems that reliably orchestrate massive, distributed environments. You’ll work on tools that power release workflows, regression testing, and large-scale automated deployments used across the entire organization. If you want to work with automation at scale, build tools that internal teams rely on daily, and solve real, impactful engineering problems across hardware and software, this is the right place.
 



  





**MORE ABOUT TOPTRACER** 




  





**Workplace** 




  





 We value fully engaged associates that come to work because they enjoy their work and the colleagues they have. We strive to create a diverse and inclusive work environment where everybody can reach their full potential. We provide opportunities for all colleagues to develop internally and to meet each other. We have a strong commitment and dedication at Toptracer. That comes from the activities and moments we share together and the product we are developing.
 



  





 In addition to that, our technology is unique and world-leading which makes the journey extra exciting. We create a product that encourages people to be outside and get activated which enables a healthier lifestyle. As a colleague at Toptracer, you can either go to a range nearby your home to experience the product you have developed or just turn on the TV to see it in the biggest golf tournaments.
 



  





**Culture** 




 Our culture is driven by our mission to create moments that matter for everyone and our values for Caring, One Team, Fun, Excellence and Edgy Spirit. If you want to learn more about them visit: Core Values | Topgolf.
 



  





**Activities** 



* Morning Fikas
* After-work
* Pair/Mob programming
* Conference
* Dart
* Gym sessions
* Table-tennis
* Golf simulator
* Golf tournaments



  





**Benefits** 



* Competitive salary and benefits package.
* Opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies and projects.
* Collaborative and innovative work environment.
* Professional development and growth opportunities.
* A hybrid work environment with the primary workplace at our cozy and welcoming office in Mörby Centrum, Danderyd.
* And of course, play golf!



  





 The position is permanent and full-time, located at our office in Danderyd. Hit the link at the bottom of the page to read more about the team. We hope to hear from you soon!
 



  





**Social media:** 




 https://vimeo.com/339546469
 



 https://www.toptracer.com/
 



 https://careers.toptracer.com
 



 https://www.instagram.com/toptracer/?hl=sv

title: Full Stack Developer wanted for Healthcare Scale Up - Node, React, TypeScript
description:
**Senior Full-Stack Engineer (Backend-focused) | Stockholm** 




  





 We’re looking for
 **2 Senior Full-Stack Engineers** 
 to join a small, highly experienced team in the
 **healthtech sector** 
 at a fast-growing European product company. The team works on
 **business-critical systems** 
 that handle complex workflows at scale.
 



  





 This is a hands-on role. You’ll be building features
 **end-to-end** 
 and shaping how the platform scales as the company grows into new markets.
 



  





**What you’ll work on** 



* An internal web platform used daily to assess and resolve customer cases
* Automation and decision systems that interpret incoming data and handle processes end-to-end
* Designing and implementing
 **backend-heavy systems (60/40)** 
 with frontend integration
* Scaling services and maintaining robustness, performance, and security across multiple markets



  





**Tech stack** 



* **Backend:** 
 Node.js, Python, TypeScript
* **Frontend:** 
 React, Next.js
* GraphQL, MongoDB, DynamoDB
* AWS (foundations team handles most infra, but experience matters)
* Exposure to automation and AI/LLM tools is a plus



  





**Who they’re looking for** 



* Around
 **8+ years of experience** 
 as a full-stack or backend-focused engineer

title: QA Software Engineer
description:
Are you a developer with a strong passion for building high-quality, testable software? We are looking for a
 **Senior Quality Engineer with a solid software development background** 
 to join our team responsible for managing equipment through an online service.This is a
 **hybrid role** 
 that requires
 **working from our office in Tumba (Stockholm) at least 3 days per week** 
 .Your primary focus will be combining
 **hands-on software development** 
 with
 **advanced testing practices** 
 , ensuring that quality is built into the product from design to production.
   

  

**Role And Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and maintain testable, reliable and maintainable backend features as an active part of the development team.
* Write production-level code to support automated testing, test frameworks, and developer tooling.
* Create and manage test data across multiple environments to support reliable and repeatable testing.
* Design and execute tests at multiple levels, including unit, integration, API, system, and end-to-end testing.
* Build and evolve test automation frameworks and integrate them into CI/CD pipelines.
* Improve and maintain quality metrics, dashboards, and reporting to give transparency into software health.
* Collaborate closely with developers, product managers, and architects to define quality and testability requirements early in the design phase.


**Qualifications**
 To be successful in this role we believe that you have:
   

  

* Valid work permit in Sweden or Swedish citizenship (mandatory).
* 5+ years of experience in software development, test automation, or a combination of both.
* Proven experience as a software developer (minimum 2 years), preferably working with backend systems and APIs.
* Strong programming skills in Python, JavaScript, Java, or similar languages.
* Experience building and maintaining automated tests across multiple layers (unit, integration, system, E2E).
* Deep understanding of test design, test data management, and environment management.
* Hands-on experience with CI/CD pipelines and test integration.
* Strong skills in requirement analysis, system design thinking, and end-to-end quality ownership.
* Experience working in agile development environments (Scrum, Kanban).


**Bonus Skills (optional)**
* Experience with performance and load testing tools (e.g., JMeter, LoadRunner).
* Experience with API testing tools (e.g., Postman, REST Assured).
* Experience with Infrastructure as Code (such as cloudformation templates, CDK, terraform)
* Knowledge of security testing practices.
* Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS or Azure.
* ISTQB certification or equivalent.


**Working at DeLaval**
 Our core values Passion, People, Professionals and Partnerships connect individuals across entities and geographies. Success is far more than knowledge – it is strongly related to behavior. At DeLaval we are all guided by our three behaviors: Set Direction, Make Things Happen and One DeLaval.
   

  

 We Offer You a Workplace Like No Other, Where State-of-the-art Technology Goes Hand In Hand With Animal Welfare. DeLaval Is a Part Of The Tetra Laval Group Together With Tetra Pak And Sidel. In Addition, We Offer
   

  

* A secure employment and benefits from the collective agreement (occupational pension, work-related accident insurance, parental leave, reduction of working hours).
* Parental leave compensation (approx. 10 percent of the employee's monthly salary).
* Wellness contribution of 4 000 SEK/year.
* Private health insurance.
* Flexible working hours.


**Additional Information**
 This is a full-time permanent position based at DeLaval’s headquarters in Tumba, south of Stockholm. We offer a hybrid workplace model, allowing flexibility to work remotely; however, employees are expected to be in the office at least three days per week.
   

  

 We review applications ongoing, due to the holidays the feedback may. Please note that due to staff holidays, the recruitment process may take longer than usual and responses may be delayed. We appreciate your patience.
   

  

 We do not accept applications via email, however if you have any questions regarding the role or the recruitment process don’t hesitate to contact us.
   

  

**Contact**
 Hiring manager: Magnus Storbjörk, magnus.storbjork@delaval.com
   

  

 Recruiter: Agnes Edbom, agnes.edbom@delaval.com
   

  

**About DeLaval**
 Our vision is to make sustainable food production possible. As a company built on innovation, we constantly work to find ways of helping our customers, dairy farmers, do more with less by providing world-leading milking equipment and solutions.
   

  

 Today, DeLaval has approximately 4,500 passionate professionals operating in more than 100 markets around the world. DeLaval is part of the Tetra Laval Group. See more at corporate.delaval.com

title: Software Engineer – Complex Interactions
description:
**Join us in creating world-class creativity apps used by millions of people.** 




 Appostrophe builds design software used by millions of people. Our main product, SCRL, is a creative design app where users compose layouts, manipulate visual elements, and make designs through multi-touch interaction.
 



  





 Building this kind of software is less about CRUD and more about geometry, state, and mathematical correctness. We’re looking for a Software Engineer who thrives working in that problem space.
 



  





**About the role** 




 This role focuses on the core logic behind a design tool: how objects are positioned, transformed, constrained, and edited through user interaction.
 



  





 You’ll work on problems like coordinate systems, transformations, snapping, layout logic, and interaction flows. Much of the work involves turning complex requirements into systems that behave predictably and feel intuitive to users.
 



  





 The role is language- and platform-agnostic. We care about strong fundamentals and clear reasoning more than prior experience with a specific tech stack.
 



  





**What you will work on** 



* Solving challenging geometry and complex interaction problems for cutting edge design software.
* Reasoning about coordinate spaces, transformations, scaling, rotation, and mirroring.
* Building logic for core interactions such as selection, dragging, resizing, snapping, and alignment.
* Creating the underlying logic for advanced tools and layer types in the editor.
* Designing state models that support complex editing flows, including undo/redo.
* Handling edge cases where multiple features interact in non-obvious ways.
* Collaborating closely with design and product engineers to translate interaction ideas into precise, implementable behavior.
* Iterating on features based on real-world usage and user feedback.



  





**What we’re looking for** 



* Strong experience building production software in any language or environment.
* Natural mathematical and geometric reasoning ability.
* Ability to design systems that are precise, predictable, and maintainable.
* Enjoyment of complex interaction problems rather than purely data-oriented ones.
* High standards for correctness and long-term code quality.
* Ability to explain and discuss technical decisions clearly.



  





**Strong signals** 



* Background in competitive programming, physics, mathematics, or similar fields.
* A history of excelling in math-heavy coursework.
* Interest in algorithms, data structures, and performance where they matter.
* Experience with design tools, creative software, or editors.



  





**What we offer** 



* Ownership of core product behavior that users interact with every day.
* Technical and challenging problems that require careful thought.
* A small team that values clear reasoning and direct communication.
* The opportunity to build and ship products to millions of users across the world.
* Great colleagues and office in central Stockholm.
* Competitive compensation and opportunities for professional development.

 We love flexibility and remote work, we also believe in the power of meeting in real life. With a mix of working remote and collaborating in the office, we believe in a flexible workplace that suits you and Qliro.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
**Overview** 




  





 Paxport is a growing travel tech company transforming the digital travel experience. We provide innovative, API-first solutions for airlines and travel resellers.
 



  





 Being a small team working in an agile environment you will directly influence the evolution of our products. We’re heavily focused on aggregating APIs; both designing our own and integrating those offered by suppliers (airlines etc). We also love aggregating data; importing / exporting and all steps in between.
 



  





 Are you a seasoned Java Developer who thrives on complex challenges, including navigating and modernizing critical legacy systems? Do you possess the technical depth to build cutting-edge solutions while ensuring the stability of existing infrastructure? Join our dynamic team where you will be instrumental in evolving our core platform.
 



  





**About the Role** 




  





 We are seeking a highly experienced Senior Java Developer to join our engineering department. This role is unique and critical, requiring a strong background in modern Java development practices (Java 17+) coupled with a deep, practical understanding of older/legacy enterprise systems. You will be tasked with developing new features, optimizing performance, and strategically migrating components from our legacy codebase to a modern architecture.
 



  





 The ideal candidate will be a collaborative problem-solver, capable of designing large-scale system improvements and mentoring junior team members.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 




  





 Design, develop, test, and deploy highly performant and scalable applications using Java.
 



 Spearhead the analysis, refactoring, and strategic modernization of mission-critical legacy systems.
 



 Collaborate with product managers and other engineers to define feature specifications and deliver high-quality solutions.
 



 Ensure application stability and performance through rigorous testing and monitoring.
 



 Contribute to technical documentation and maintain clear code standards.
 



 Participate in code reviews and architectural discussions.
 



  





**Required Qualifications** 




  





**Experience:** 
 7+ years of professional software development experience, primarily with Java.
 



**Java Expertise:** 
 Mastery of modern Java (Java 17+) and the Spring framework (Spring Boot).
 



**Legacy Systems:** 
 Proven ability to understand, debug, and work effectively with older Java versions (e.g., Java 8, 7) and related enterprise technologies.
 



**Database Skills:** 
 Strong proficiency in SQL.
 



**Cloud/DevOps:** 
 Experience with GCP cloud platform and CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI).
 



**Testing:** 
 Expertise in unit, integration, and system testing.
 



**Microservices:** 
 Experience with microservices architecture and containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes).

 Working with large-scale, high-availability systems.
 



  





  





**Location and Work Model** 




  





**Location:** 
 Sweden / Hybrid / Stockholm Oﬀice

title: Embedded Developer
description:
At Sii Sweden we partner with some of the most forward-thinking companies across industries such as automotive, healthcare, life-science and banking.
 



 As an Embedded Software Developer at Sii, you won’t just write code—you’ll contribute to the success of diverse, high-impact projects that demand both deep technical knowledge and creative problem-solving; you’ll play a key role in delivering tailored solutions that meet client’s unique requirements.
 



 Joining us means working in a collaborative, consultancy-driven environment so If you're excited by challenge and the opportunity to grow alongside some of the best engineers in the field, we’d love to hear from you!
 



  





**Your tasks** 



* Design and implement software architecture for embedded systems
* Develop robust applications using C++ and Qt/QML for device interfaces and control logic
* Work on hardware-related programming, including device drivers
* Design, build, and debug embedded Linux environments (GNU/Linux) for various hardware platforms
* Write scripts and tools in Python (or equivalent) to support development, testing, and automation
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including hardware engineers, QA, and UX designers
* Contribute to design reviews, documentation, and system integration activities



  





**Requirements** 



* Degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science, or similar
* Solid experience with C++ in embedded system environments
* Strong knowledge of Qt/QML for UI and application layer development
* Experience with GNU/Linux system development and configuration
* Hands-on knowledge of hardware-level programming
* Familiarity with scripting in Python or a similar language
* Proficiency in embedded systems architecture and real-time constraints
* Ability to debug complex software/hardware interactions

title: Senior Product Engineer
description:
**We’re looking for a Senior Product Engineer (.NET) to join our small engineering team and help build and evolve a high-traffic integration platform used by eCommerce and logistics businesses operating at scale.** 




  





 This role is ideal for someone who enjoys working close to the product, understands how software decisions affect real customers, and likes improving existing systems step by step rather than rewriting everything from scratch.
 



 You’ll work on features and integrations that directly impact how orders, invoicing, inventory, payments, and warehouse flows move through the platform.
 



  





**What you will be working on** 




 Developing and improving a core .NET product used in business-critical, high-volume environments
 



 Building and maintaining integrations between eCommerce platforms, ERPs, WMSs, carriers, and third-party services
 



 Improving reliability and performance during high-traffic peak periods
 



 Working in a mainly monolithic application, with supporting microservices and external integrations
 



 Background processing and async workflows using Hangfire
 



 Incrementally improving test coverage, stability, and code quality in a mature production codebase
 



  





**What we are looking for** 



* Backend & Product Development
* Solid experience with .NET (Framework or Core) and C#
* Comfortable working in existing production systems
* Ability to understand how technical changes affect users, customers, and business flows
* Experience improving or extending systems without breaking what already works
* Fluent in both Swedish and English (required)



  




* ***Integrations & APIs***
* Hands-on experience with system integrations
* Good understanding of REST APIs, async workflows, and error handling
* Familiarity with monolithic systems and how they interact with external services



  




* ***Full-stack awareness***
* Comfortable moving across the stack when needed
* Experience with JavaScript and frontend concepts
* Able to collaborate effectively with frontend or product-focused work



  




* ***Quality & pragmatism***
* Experience writing unit and/or integration tests
* Pragmatic approach to technical debt - improving things when it makes sense
* Focus on stability, clarity, and maintainability over “perfect” solutions



  





**Highly beneficial skills** 




***Experience with integrations towards ERPs (Affärssystem)***




  





**Nice to Have (Not Required)** 



* Experience with Azure (infrastructure, hosting, scaling)
* Performance optimisation or handling high-volume systems
* CI/CD pipelines and production deployments
* Exposure to refactoring or evolving architectures over time
* Curiosity about AI-assisted development tools



  





**How You’ll Work** 



* Close collaboration with product, integrations, and customer-facing roles
* Real ownership of features and integrations end-to-end
* Technical decisions grounded in real customer needs
* A team culture that values clarity, pragmatism and low ego



  





**About Prime Penguin** 




  





 Prime Penguin builds an integration Platform as a Service (iPaaS) for e-commerce and logistics companies. Our platform connects stores, marketplaces, ERPs, warehouses, carriers, and third-party tools - giving customers real-time visibility across orders, inventory, and fulfillment.
 



 Our software runs in high-volume, business-critical environments, especially during peak trading periods. We focus on evolving the product continuously: improving architecture, performance, reliability, and developer experience while adding new capabilities.
 



 At Prime Penguin, developers are close to both the product and the customer. You’ll have real influence, clear ownership, and the opportunity to grow your role as the platform grows.

title: Senior Agentic AI Developer
description:
**About Justera Group**
 Justera Group AB is a leading Swedish IT consulting firm with great experience specializing in building high-performing technology teams and delivering end-to-end IT solutions. Led by dynamic female executives, Justera Group focuses on helping businesses harness the power of digital technologies to continuously evolve in today’s rapidly changing economy. The company has deep expertise in IT consultancy, software development, and recruitment services, providing clients with purpose-driven, well-trained consultants who consistently deliver efficient and effective results. Justera Group manages the entire talent lifecycle, from hiring to ongoing management, ensuring the right fit for each project on time and within budget. With their strong commitment to quality, collaboration, and client success, Justera Group is a trusted partner for technology innovation across Sweden.
   

  

**About the Role:**
 We are seeking a Senior Agentic AI Developer to drive real business impact by designing, implementing, and scaling agentic AI solutions within autonomous transportation systems. This role focuses on offboard ATS systems, where AI agents support operations, safety, testing, and data-driven decision-making. You will work at the intersection of AI engineering, software development, and operational excellence, collaborating across engineering, operations, and data teams to deliver autonomous, explainable, and production-grade AI workflows.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
* Lead the design, implementation, and experimentation of Agentic AI solutions for ATS offboard systems.
* Investigate and operationalize AI-driven process automation and workflow orchestration.
* Build autonomous and semi-autonomous agents that retrieve context, reason over data, and propose actions with traceable evidence.
* Develop robust software services and algorithms for data analysis within autonomous transport systems.
* Design and integrate AI solutions that enhance the value of operational and telemetry data.
* Contribute to data pipeline design and implementation using Kafka and Databricks.
* Ensure solutions are scalable, observable, and production-ready.
* Drive advanced operation development scenarios using data-driven and AI-based methods.
* Translate operational needs into technical AI solutions with measurable business outcomes.
* Act as a technical leader and coach within AI engineering.
* Collaborate cross-functionally with operations, safety, testing, and platform teams.
* Share knowledge and best practices around agentic systems, AI workflows, and emerging technologies.
* Support change management and adoption of AI-driven workflows across the organization.
* Key Use Cases You Will Work On:
+ Operations Support – Tiered Support Automation
- Automate ticket triage for Tier 1/2 operations.
- Classify incoming tickets, retrieve logs/metrics, surface similar incidents and known fixes.
- Present a “ready-to-act” context for faster resolution or escalation.

+ Road Safety – Remote Assistance Triage
- Support rapid decision-making during roadside incidents.
- Ingest vehicle telemetry and logs to identify likely root causes.
- Retrieve similar past degradations and propose next actions with supporting evidence.

+ Test Report Support – Auto-Generated & Live Status
- Automate test campaign reporting across tools and systems.
- Generate continuously updated reports with traceable references to results and issues.

+ Test Analysis – Coverage Intelligence
- Link requirements, planned tests, and executed tests.
- Identify coverage gaps, redundancies, and weak traceability.
- Support test engineers and safety reviewers with actionable insights.


**Requirements:**
* 5+ years of professional experience as a software developer.
* 2–5 years of hands-on experience implementing Agentic AI solutions.
* Proven experience taking AI solutions from concept to production.
* Strong experience with agent-based systems, AI orchestration, or autonomous workflows.
* Solid software engineering background (Python, backend services, APIs).
* Experience with data pipelines and streaming architectures (Kafka).
* Familiarity with Databricks, data lakes, and large-scale data processing.
* Experience working with logs, telemetry, metrics, and operational data.
* Understanding of AI model integration, retrieval-augmented systems, and explainability is a plus.
* Strong communication and stakeholder management skills.
* Ability to lead and influence cross-functional AI initiatives.
* Business-oriented mindset with a focus on tangible outcomes.
* Comfortable working in complex, safety-critical domains.
* Fluency in English


**What We Offer:**
* A dynamic and innovative workplace driving advancements in cutting-edge robotic technologies
* The opportunity to collaborate with talented cross-functional teams on meaningful and impactful projects
* Competitive compensation and comprehensive benefits package
* A supportive culture that fosters continuous learning, growth, and professional development
* Flexible hybrid working model for an optimal work-life balance
* 25 days of annual leave to recharge and relax
* An annual wellness allowance of 3,500 SEK to support your health and wellbeing

title: Senior Agentic AI Developer - 15030 - 20Jan

 is an IT and technology consulting company that provides highly specialized expertise in IT, software development, SAP, purchasing, electronics and mechanical design. We collaborate with experienced senior experts and deliver strategic value-creating expertise to some of Sweden's most complex and analytically demanding projects. Our focus is always on high quality, professionalism and clear, measurable results.

 **Senior Agentic AI Developer** 
 on behalf of our client.
   

  

 An autonomous transport solutions are an important contribution to the transition towards safer, more efficient and sustainable transportation. We are currently in an exciting commercialization phase of autonomous in-pit mining trucks. Our team mission is to support operations of autonomous transport system via effective utilization of data.
   

  

 We are looking for a Senior AI agent engineer who is enthusiastic about making real business impact with AI agents in autonomous transportation. We have identified and validated four use cases to implement in 2026. All use cases have been developed with clear team ownership and commitment from management. Use cases in 2026 focus on well-defined workflows in software development, customer service and operational support and will include internal data and system integration via MCP and OpenAI-based platform for LLM capabilities.
   

  

 The ideal candidate has a proven ability in implementing agentic ai solutions and have a passion for bringing the latest technologies to the market. Also, the candidate has strong communication and change management skills and know how to lead cross functional AI initiatives with focus on tangible business outcomes.
   

  

**Your Responsibilities**
* Drive the implementation of Agentic AI in the ATS offboard system domain by investigating and experimenting on relevant use cases in relation to process automation and workflow orchestration.
* Coach and contribute as though leader within AI engineering through cross-functional collaboration and knowledge sharing.
* Drive operation development scenarios within autonomous transport systems with advanced data-driven methods
* Developing software and services as well as designing algorithms for data analysis within autonomous transport system domain
* Develop and integrate AI solutions that enhance the impact of our operational data products
* Helping the team to design and develop appropriate data pipelines in Kafka and Databricks


 Hybrid (4 days on site in Södertälje)
   

  

 Master’s or Bachelor’s degree in Data Analytics, Computer Science, Information Technology or another related fields.
   

  

 2-5 years of proven work experience from working with Agentic AI.
   

  

 5 years of proven work experience as software developer.
   

  

**Competence profile**
 Main:
   

  

* Solid experience of building AI agents and understanding of platforms like OpenAI Agent builder
* Solid theoretical background in Machine Learning, Big Data Analytics and Statistics.
* Knowledge and experience in Machine Learning and Data Analytics tools such as Databricks, Apache Spark, TensorFlow etc. Can design, develop, and maintain scalable data pipelines and solutions using Databricks, integrating with AWS, to process and analyse large datasets for business insights.
* Solid experience in Python (with focus on Machine Learning and Data Analytics)


 Supporting:
   

  

* Solid experience in AWS (Amazon Web Services) Cloud Computing Platform. Experience in Other cloud computing platforms (e.g. Microsoft Azure) is a plus.
* Good experience in Apache Kafka (Stream Processing Platform) and Event-Driven Systems
* Demonstrated experience in Alarming, Monitoring and Logging for Event-driven Systems.
* Knowledge and experience in Terraform (Infrastructure as Code tool for cloud)
* Knowledge and experience in CI/CD and GitLab


**Use cases that the candidate will be developing:**
* Operations Support – Tiered Support Automation


 This use case supports the Tier 1/2 operations team by helping with ticket triage. The idea is straightforward: when a new ticket arrives, the system classifies it, pulls in relevant context (logs, metrics, similar past tickets, known fixes), and presents a “ready-to-act” view so humans can resolve or escalate faster.
   

  

* Road Safety – Remote Assistance Triage


 Remote Assistance Triage targets roadside incidents, where supervisors must very quickly understand what is happening and decide the next step. The idea is that the system ingests vehicle/telemetry logs and related data, retrieves similar past degradations and resolutions, and proposes likely causes and next actions, together with links to the underlying evidence.
   

  

* Support for Test Report – Autogen & Live Status


 This use case is about automating test campaign reporting. Instead of engineers manually pulling numbers and screenshots from multiple tools into Excel or slides, a workflow would assemble the report directly from source systems and keep it up to date, with traceable references to underlying results and issues.
   

  

* Support for Test Analysis – Coverage Intelligence


 Here the goal is to support test engineers and safety reviewers in understanding what has actually been tested and where the gaps are. The system would link requirements, planned tests, and executed tests, then highlight missing coverage, redundant tests, and weak traceability.
   

  

**Other Information :**
**Start Date :** 
 2026-01-26
   

  

**End Date :** 
 2026-12-31
   

  

**Application Deadline** 
 : 2026-01-19
   

  

**Work Model :** 
 Hybrid
   

  

 Please apply directly through our system with:
   

  

* Your updated CV
* Availability to start the assignment


 In the motivation, describe why you are suitable for this assignment - refer to previous consulting assignments, employment, education and personal qualities.
   

  

**Please note:** 
 We do not accept any applications through mail. All applications have to be sent through the portal to be valid.

title: GenAI Developer
description:
Deerdata is a fast-growing analytics and AI consultancy focused on building data-driven and AI-powered decision support that creates real business value. We work close to both data and business, turning advanced analytics and AI into solutions that are actually used.
 



  
 



 We are now looking for a
 **GenAI Developer** 
  to strengthen our AI offering and help us build and scale generative AI solutions in production environments.
 



  
 



**Role and responsibilities** 




 As a GenAI Developer at Deerdata, you will:
 


* Design, build, and deploy generative AI solutions in production
* Develop AI agents, copilots, and decision-support applications
* Work with large language models, retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), embeddings, and prompt engineering
* Integrate AI solutions with existing data platforms and business systems
* Collaborate closely with data architects, analytics consultants, and business stakeholders
* Contribute to best practices and technical standards for generative AI solutions



  
 



**Required experience and skills** 




 We expect you to have:
 


* 3+ years of experience in software development or data engineering
* Practical experience working with generative AI and large language models
* Strong skills in Python (TypeScript or similar languages are a plus)
* Experience working with cloud platforms such as Azure, AWS, or GCP
* Good understanding of data architectures and how AI solutions consume and use data
* Ability to translate business needs into technical solutions
* Strong communication skills and a structured way of working



  
 



**Meriting experience** 




 It is considered a strong advantage if you have experience with:
 


* Building AI agents or copilots for real business use cases
* Azure OpenAI, OpenAI, or Gemini
* MLOps, model deployment, or operating AI solutions in production
* Consulting or other customer-facing roles



  
 



**What we offer** 



* The opportunity to work with generative AI in real-world, production-grade solutions
* High degree of influence on technical direction and solution design
* A fast-growing company with short decision paths
* Flexible working conditions and a high level of trust
* Opportunities for professional growth as the company scales



  
 



 Location: Stockholm
 



 Start date: By agreement
 


* For questions or applications, please contact us or apply directly via LinkedIn.

title: ServiceNow Utvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Minst 9 års erfarenhet
* Minst 3 års dokumenterad erfarenhet av utveckling i ServiceNow.
* Minst 1 års dokumenterad erfarenhet av arbete i ServiceNow Self-hosted/On-prem miljö.
* Minst 5 års dokumenterad erfarenhet av utveckling med JavaScript, HTML och CSS.


**Meriterande**
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av minst 2 genomförda projekt inom ServiceNow ITSM.
* Certifieringen ServiceNow Certified Implementation Specialist – ITSM (CIS-ITSM).
* Inneha ServiceNow Certified System Administrator (CSA).
* Inneha certifiering i ITIL version 3 eller senare.
* Varit delaktig vid utförning av patchning, kloning och uppgraderingar i ServiceNow Self-hosted/On-prem miljö.


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 21-01-2026
   

  

**Om Oss**
 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Här påverkar du din egen lön som helt och hållet som baseras på ditt timpris mot kund.
   

  

 Vår lönemodell är en hybridlösning mellan en fast månadslön och en provisionsbaserad ersättning. Det innebär att din månadslön baseras på ditt timpris, fast om du mot förmodan skulle stå utan uppdrag så behåller du en grund lön fram tills vi hittat ett nytt uppdrag, bra va?
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Senior backend developer
description:
**Senior Full-stack/Backend Developer role (With some scrum master/lead responsibilities!) - Fintech 💻🔥** 




  





 I'm looking for an experienced engineer who has experience as a scrum master/project lead, or someone who is a senior developer and eager to step into a role where you'd be hands-on with the code, but also be able to take a step towards leadership, project planning, roadmap and strategy!
 



  





 The company itself are a well-established product company whose platform is a user-focused, data-driven engine which helps people make more informed financial decisions, and allows them to find, compare and secure the best deals on loans, mortgages, interest rates and other financial services, easier than ever before!
 



  





 Ultimately, their product is to help people save money, free of charge! They have been around for 10+ years, are partnered with over 40 of Sweden's biggest banks and financial companies, consistently profitable, but retain a small to mid-sized company feel, and have a lot of exciting development in the pipeline.
 



  





 With this in mind, they are looking for an experienced full-stack/backend-focused engineer to join their 12-person tech team, a super flat and collaborative department where everyone can take ownership of their area & growth is both encouraged and facilitated!
 



  





 Hybrid role - Stockholm central office
 



  





  





**Responsibilities** 




  




* Writing clean, high-quality, high-performance, maintainable code
* Tech stack: Typescript/Javascript, NodeJS, VueJS, MongoDB, Grafana, AWS, SQL, Git
* Develop and support software including applications, database integration, interfaces, and new functionality enhancements
* Coordinate cross-functionally to insure project meets business objectives and compliance standards, acting as scrum master and playing a key part of project roadmap, planning and organisation!
* Support test and deployment of new products and features
* Participate in code reviews



  





**Qualifications** 




  




* 5+ years of experience with most of our stack (as above)
* Experience with Agile or Scrum software development methodologies, ideally having had scrum-master responsibility, project lead and/or an interest in doing so
* fluent English speaker
* Full right to work in Sweden without the need for Visa extension or sponsorship or assistance of any sort
